price: Àṣẹ Allāhu dé tán. Ẹ ma wulẹ̀ wá a pẹ̀lú ìkánjú. Mímọ́ ni fún Un. Ó sì ga tayọ n̄ǹkan tí wọ́n ń fi ṣẹbọ sí I.
arabic: أَتَىٰٓ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: atā amru al-lahi falā tastaʿjilūhu sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
